channel.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
channel.description:
[center][size=36pt]Community-rsps[/size]
Our Forums: www.community-rsps.com
Community-rsps has been running for about 4months and i believe its the most advanced 317 out there on rsw, what makes it so unique and advanced? Read and watch the video..
[size=18pt]Free for all events[/size] Added ffa into the server so whenever there are many people that are pking i can turn ffa on and people will have way more fun pking.
[size=18pt]Ingame Highscores[/size] for those people that like to train to become the best. Advanced econemy, and im serious, the eco is just sick compared to any other server, just picture this: ags is 10mil to the general store and that is the item with the most value, so yeah... But that dosent make its harder to make money, it only depends if you dont know anything about a rsps or not.
[size=18pt]TriviaBot[/size] Example: First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp
[size=18pt]Clue Scrolls[/size] To much to write There is a guide on this on the forums Show everything from who drops where and what, to drop rates
[size=18pt]Quests[/size] .Currently have 2 quests Rewards? .Ardy cloak 1 .10million gp .Crystal key Npc kill shop where regular players can buy a yell right
[size=18pt]Castle Wars[/size] .Basic castle wars like Runescape .Increase armour bounse in shop which takes castle wars tickets
[size=18pt]Custom Construction[/size] .Can train it everywhere .Dosent bother others because only you can see it .Got a good idea on how to make it better, post on forums [/center]
[size=18pt]Media[/size] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OfMsM4_vXp8[/youtube] [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/r0rosl.jpg[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/11hz6zm.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/2qu15io.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2egfa4h.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/bfq136.png[/img] [img]http://i40.tinypic.com/ohiw02.png[/img] [img]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zgx8qw.png[/img] [img]http://i39.tinypic.com/2dkmm9c.png[/img]

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @Java-RSPS-Noob Java-RSPS-Noob
item.description:
@Java-RSPS-Noob wrote:

[quote=“4x4Chevrolet, post:10, topic:524795”]You need to do some research on how an economy works. Right now it looks like this guy runs your server:

[/quote]is that even the real obama? picture looks off lol

[hr]

OT: Looks okay I guess but these guys are trying to help you. Get rid of the 10m gp every 4 hour event. For every 1gp you put into the economy you need to have a way to get that 1gp out of the economy and out of others hands.

You say well construction is expensive. Who is to say they will train construction?

Read full topic

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You need to do some research on how an economy works. Right now it looks like this guy runs your server:

Read full topic

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

The point being players need to earn their gold by playing the game, not getting on every 4 hours to answer a traviabot question. You can’t really mix the two, it just creates problems. If money is hard to come by in the normal manor or earning it (pvp, pvm, skiling, etc), then you either have to conform the server to that by making things cheaper (no 500m claws) or making income higher. You don’t just throw in a few commands that make cash from nothing.

Read full topic

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @allunited allunited
item.description:
@allunited wrote:

I have construction added, which costs tons of gp, also, getting f cape costs gp, then if you want a tokhaar-kahl that costs a fire cape and more gp so yes i have money sinks

Read full topic

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

Which is 60m every day that is injected into a server, which means you need a way to remove ~60m every day in order to keep your eco balanced.

Read full topic

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @allunited allunited
item.description:
@allunited wrote:

Rofl? complaining about that…Are you stupid? that message pops up ever 4 hours which is about 10million gp into the server every 4 hours…Just remember to think before you post

Read full topic

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:

“Example:
First person to type c34t5yh@3£ gets 10million gp”

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @BrandonHarkness BrandonHarkness

Looks alright, may drop in.

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @allunited allunited
item.description:
@allunited wrote:

Well i should actually change the price on the cape because it is very pricey, but still, my server has great eco, might not have been a good example just by showing that pic but picture this, all drops from npcs have been nerfd like you would have on near-reality, this isent just a server where you got bandos chest from general graador and you could sell to general store for 500mil, on my server its better to keep the chest and sell it to players

Read full topic

item.title: Community-rsps Unique server.Vps Hosted
item.dc:creator: @Elrick Elrick
item.description:
@Elrick wrote:

So you say that your eco is great… Because things are priced really low? I don’t think you understand how an economy really works. What I think you’re discussing in that statement is a lack of inflation. Which in itself seems hard to believe, as a cape is 400m to obtain. So it is either a super elite grand master item that only the rich can afford, or you have so much money in your eco that 400m isn’t a lot or hard to obtain.

Read full topic
